meanings.sent1: The painting looked even vulgarer with its bright colors and bold shapes.

meanings.definition: Characterized by ignorance or lack of refinement
meanings.sent1: His vulgarer manners made it clear he was not used to formal events.

meanings.sent4: The vulgarer behavior of the children shocked the teacher.
